description.value: You transformed ingredients into something that warmed both body and spirit. Whether you worked in a noble's kitchen with exotic spices or a roadside inn with whatever was available, you understand that a good meal creates community. Adventuring might pay better than kitchen work, but you still find yourself feeding your companions. Skills: Craft 2, Wilderness 2, Perception 1, Society 1, +40 XP Equipment: Apron, work clothes, shoes Feature - Comfort Food: Meals you prepare during rests grant one additional HP recovery (once per rest, applies to whole party).
